Well, sir, we have the extended report at length, and it appears that £50,000 is the sum to be placed in the estimates this year. It appears from this that they do not consider the case as so very urgent—not, at all events, so urgent as to require the business of the Parliament of this country to be suspended, in order that Ministers may hasten thither to make provi- sion for the defence of the country.
